<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ki Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=1760) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 131 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
ki spells

</column>

---

You have mastered a potent technique for using your ki to reinforce your physical form and propel yourself through the air. You gain the [_ki form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=738) ki spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
